articles.title: Crypto exchanges brace for pressure as banks like JPMorgan enter spot trading
articles.mainIdea: Crypto exchanges brace for pressure as banks like JPMorgan enter spot trading
articles.summary: CoinDesk: Crypto exchanges brace for pressure as banks like JPMorgan enter spot trading. The national banks regulator OCC released a statement signaling a shift in rules that will have significant crypto market consequences across the United States.

articles.title: LivaNova to Present at J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference in January
articles.mainIdea: LivaNova to Present at J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference in January
articles.summary: Business Wire: LivaNova to Present at J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference in January. LONDON, December 23, 2025--LivaNova PLC (Nasdaq: LIVN), a market-leading medical technology company, today announced it will present at the J.P. Morgan 44th Annual Healthcare Conference in San Francisco. Vladimir Makatsaria, Chief Executive Officer of LivaNova, and Alex Shvartsburg, Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a fireside chat on Wed., Jan. 14, 2026, at 1:30 p.m. Pacific Standard Time. Related tickers mentioned: LIVN.

articles.title: Kailera Therapeutics to Present at 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
articles.mainIdea: Kailera Therapeutics to Present at 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Kailera Therapeutics to Present at 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference. WALTHAM, Mass. and SAN DIEGO, Dec. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kailera Therapeutics, Inc., an advanced clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on elevating the next era of obesity care, today announced that Ron Renaud, President and Chief Executive Officer, will present at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference in San Francisco, California, on Monday, January 12, 2025, at 11:00 a.m. PT. articles.title: Why Analysts See St. James's Place Undervalued As Its Investment Story Evolves
articles.mainIdea: Why Analysts See St. James's Place Undervalued As Its Investment Story Evolves
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Why Analysts See St. James's Place Undervalued As Its Investment Story Evolves. St. James's Place has seen its fair value estimate nudged higher to about £15.42 per share, as analysts grow more confident that the wealth manager can deliver on its earnings and capital generation plans. This modest uplift reflects a market narrative that is becoming more constructive, yet still mindful of regulatory and execution risks that could limit a more aggressive rerating. Stay tuned to see how investors can track these evolving price targets and the shifting story behind them over... Related tickers mentioned: STJPF.

articles.title: A Look at What Charlie Javice Charged JPMorgan in Legal Bills
articles.mainIdea: A Look at What Charlie Javice Charged JPMorgan in Legal Bills
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: A Look at What Charlie Javice Charged JPMorgan in Legal Bills. Charlie Javice was convicted of defrauding the bank when she sold her educational startup, Frank, for $175 million to JPMorgan Chase in 2021. But in a twist, the bank has been picking up the legal bills for Javice and Olivier Amar, another executive, because of a clause in that deal that said JPMorgan would shoulder all associated costs in the event of a dispute.
